short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to enable and disable dark mode on any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the ultimate solution for eye care while browsing the web! Our simple and small extension, seamlessly changes the style of all pages you visit, reducing strain on your eyes and improving your overall browsing experience. Say goodbye to tired eyes and hello to effortless browsing with our extension. Try it now!
If you have any suggestions for how we can make our extension even better, we'd love to hear your feedback.
